item.title: Akshay Kumar CONFIRMED In Stree 3, Dinesh Vijan Calls Him 'Thanos' Of Maddock Horror-Comedy Universe | Excl - News18
item.description:
Akshay Kumar to Star in Stree 3 as 'Thanos' of Maddock Horror-Comedy Universe

Date: January 05, 2025, Source: News18

Akshay Kumar's return to the Maddock Films' horror-comedy universe has been confirmed for Stree 3, with Dinesh Vijan humorously referring to him as the 'Thanos' of the franchise.

  • Akshay's cameo in Stree 2 was highly successful, helping it become the highest-grossing Bollywood film of all time.
  • The upcoming Stree 3 is set for release on August 13, 2025.
  • Akshay hinted at his role by stating, ‚ÄúDinesh and Jyoti will have to decide that they‚Äôre the ones to pump in the money.‚Äù
  • Dinesh Vijan confirmed Akshay‚Äôs involvement, saying, ‚ÄúOf course, he‚Äôs a part of the universe! He‚Äôs our Thanos.‚Äù
  • Stree 2 starred Rajkummar Rao and Shraddha Kapoor, earning over Rs 600 crore in India.
‚ÄúOf course, he‚Äôs a part of the universe! He‚Äôs our Thanos (laughs).‚Äù - Dinesh Vijan

The anticipation for Stree 3 is high, as fans are eager to see how Akshay Kumar's character will evolve within the beloved horror-comedy universe.

item.title: Sky Force Trailer: Akshay Kumar, Veer Pahariya Bring Tail Of India's 'Deadliest' Airstrike - News18
item.description:
Sky Force Trailer: Akshay Kumar, Veer Pahariya Bring Tail Of India's 'Deadliest' Airstrike

Date: January 05, 2025 Source: News18

The trailer for Akshay Kumar's much-anticipated film, Sky Force, has been released, showcasing a narrative set during the 1965 India-Pakistan Air War. Kumar plays an Indian Air Force officer, with Veer Pahariya making his acting debut alongside him.

  • The film portrays the story of India‚Äôs first airstrike against Pakistan during the 1965 war.
  • Akshay Kumar's character gives a solemn warning to Pakistan before the mission.
  • Veer Pahariya's character goes missing during the airstrike, prompting a search effort that the Indian government struggles to complete.
  • Sara Ali Khan plays the role of Pahariya's love interest.
  • The film is directed by Sandeep Kewlani and Abhishek Kapur and will be released on January 24, 2025.
‚ÄúThis Republic Day, witness the untold story of a heroic sacrifice ‚Äì the tale of India‚Äôs first and deadliest airstrike.‚Äù - Akshay Kumar

Fans have expressed excitement over the trailer, with many praising Kumar's portrayal and anticipating a successful film.

item.description:
Aishwarya Rai Bachchan faces criticism for her interaction with daughter Aaradhya at Mumbai Airport

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Not specified

Aishwarya Rai Bachchan has come under scrutiny for how she interacted with her daughter, Aaradhya, during a recent appearance at Mumbai Airport. Critics have pointed out the nature of their interaction.

  • Comments critiqued her parenting style and the public display of affection.

item.title: Sky Force trailer out: Akshay Kumar and debutant Veer Pahariya deliver goosebumps in patriotic action drama; rendition of Lata Mangeshkar‚Äôs ‚ÄòAye Mere Watan Ke Logo‚Äô is cherry on the top, watch - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Sky Force trailer out: Akshay Kumar and debutant Veer Pahariya deliver goosebumps in patriotic action drama; rendition of Lata Mangeshkar‚Äôs ‚ÄòAye Mere Watan Ke Logo‚Äô is cherry on the top, watch

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Bollywood Hungama

The much-awaited trailer of SkyForce is finally out, promising a gripping cinematic experience packed with action, emotion, and patriotism. Led by Akshay Kumar and debutant Veer Pahariya, the film showcases the story of India‚Äôs first deadly airstrike, set against the turbulent backdrop of Indo-Pak tensions in the 1960s-70s.

Key Points:

  • Trailer features Akshay Kumar in a patriotic avatar.
  • Veer Pahariya makes his debut with an intense portrayal.
  • Emotional journey highlighted, especially of Veer‚Äôs character who goes missing in action.
  • Rendition of ‚ÄòAye Mere Watan Ke Logo‚Äô by Lata Mangeshkar adds to the emotional impact.
  • Directed by Sandeep Kewlani and Abhishek Anil Kapur.
  • Produced by Maddock Films and Jio Studios.
‚ÄúThe dedication of the crew made this challenging project possible.‚Äù ‚Äì Sandeep Kewlani

The trailer of SkyForce successfully sets the stage for an emotionally charged and action-packed narrative that enthralls audiences.

item.title: Baby John is Varun Dhawan‚Äôs lowest grossing film at the end of 11 days - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Baby John is Varun Dhawan‚Äôs lowest grossing film at the end of 11 days

Publication Date: December 25, 2024
Source: Times of India

Varun Dhawan, a popular actor in the Hindi film industry, sees his latest release, 'Baby John', disappointingly perform at the box office, marking it as his lowest grossing film to date.

  • 'Baby John' has grossed Rs 37.75 crore after 11 days.
  • The film, released on December 25, 2024, is an adaptation of the Tamil hit 'Theri'.
  • Dhawan previously had successful films, including 'Student of the Year' and 'Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania'.
  • Compared to Dhawan's previous films, 'Baby John' has performed poorly, even lower than films like 'October' and 'Kalank'.
  • Despite the low performance, Dhawan has several promising projects lined up for the next year.
‚ÄúBaby John‚Äôs debacle has been a shocking one for the industry.‚Äù

The disappointing performance of 'Baby John' signals a potential shift in Dhawan's once-flourishing career, raising questions about future projects as he aims to regain his box office appeal.

item.title: All eyes are on Sankranthi Vasthunnam‚Äôs trailer - 123telugu
item.description:
All eyes are on Sankranthi Vasthunnam‚Äôs trailer

Published on Jan 5, 2025 10:11 am IST

This Sankranti promises a feast for moviegoers with three major releases: Ram Charan‚Äôs Game Changer on January 10, 2025, Balakrishna‚Äôs Daaku Maharaaj on January 12, 2025, and Venkatesh‚Äôs Sankranthiki Vasthunnam on January 14, 2025.

Expectations are running high for all three films, as fans look forward to seeing their favorite stars light up the big screen. While the theatrical trailers for Game Changer and Daaku Maharaaj have already raised excitement, Sankranthiki Vasthunnam is now in the spotlight.

The film‚Äôs aggressive promotions have already built intense anticipation among audiences. Now, all eyes are on the theatrical trailer, which is expected to deliver an entertaining and impactful glimpse of the movie, further boosting the hype. The trailer is releasing tomorrow and fans await how Venky will entertain them.

Directed by Anil Ravipudi, Sankranthiki Vasthunnam stars Meenakshi Chaudhary and Aishwarya Rajesh in key roles. The film is described as an action drama with a perfect mix of entertainment. Produced by Dil Raju, it features music by Bheems Ceciroleo.

item.title: Massive Pre-Business for Sankranthiki Vastunnam - TrackTollywood
item.description:
Massive Pre-Business for Sankranthiki Vastunnam

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Track Tollywood

Sankranthiki Vastunnam has made significant pre-business strides ahead of its release. Directed by Anil Ravipudi and starring Victory Venkatesh, the film competes with other major releases this Sankranthi.

  • The film is directed by Anil Ravipudi, known for previous successes.
  • It is up against major films: Game Changer and Daaku Maharaaj.
  • The worldwide theatrical business is projected to reach 55Cr.
  • Positive word of mouth is expected to boost its box office performance.
  • The trailer is set to be released on January 6th.
"This is a very good business for the film, and also it will be easily achievable if it gets positive word of mouth."

The strong promotional efforts and the established brand value of the cast and crew suggest that Sankranthiki Vastunnam is poised for a successful box office run amidst stiff competition.

item.title: Daaku Maharaaj trailer: After Suriya in Kanguva, Bobby Deol locks horns with Nandamuri Balakrishna in Telugu debut - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Daaku Maharaaj trailer: Nandamuri Balakrishna is the dacoit who is hailed as 'Daaku Maharaaj'. He is also seen having a close relationship with a child.

Publication Date: Jan 05, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The trailer of Daaku Maharaaj, featuring Nandamuri Balakrishna, was released on Sunday, showcasing action and drama with Balakrishna in the lead role.

  • Nandamuri Balakrishna plays the titular role of a dacoit known as 'Daaku Maharaaj'.
  • Bobby Deol portrays the antagonist, causing turmoil for the characters.
  • The film also stars Urvashi Rautela and features intense action scenes.
  • The trailer reveals a close bond between Balakrishna's character and a child.
  • The movie is set to release on January 12.
‚ÄúKING of the Jungle Begins it HUNT!! #DaakuMaharaaj is set to unleash the MASS MADNESS at theatres this Sankranthi!‚Äù - Naga Vamsi, producer.

Fans have reacted positively to the trailer, expressing excitement for its release and praising Balakrishna's portrayal.

item.title: Pushpa 2 worldwide box office collection Day 31: Allu Arjun creates Rs 1200 crore club in India; Dangal is the only peak to conquer - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 worldwide box office collection Day 31: Allu Arjun creates Rs 1200 crore club in India; Dangal is the only peak to conquer

Publication Date: January 31, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

Pushpa 2 continues to perform exceptionally well at the box office, achieving remarkable financial milestones despite facing competition from other films.

  • Pushpa 2 became the fastest film to enter the Rs 1800 crore club, joining only Aamir Khan's Dangal.
  • The film's collections dipped below Rs 5 crore for the first time on its fifth Friday but bounced back with Rs 5.5 crore on Saturday.
  • The domestic earnings are projected to surpass Rs 1200 crore by the end of the fifth weekend.
  • Allu Arjun's film dethroned Baahubali 2, setting a new benchmark in Indian cinema.
  • Upcoming festive releases may impact the film's box office performance in the coming weeks.
‚ÄúThe total domestic numbers for Pushpa 2 are at a whopping Rs 1199 crore, and it is safe to assume that a new domestic club of Rs 1200 crore would be formed by the end of the fifth weekend.‚Äù

In conclusion, Pushpa 2 has established itself as a blockbuster hit, but potential future competition may influence its ongoing success at the box office.

item.title: Coldplay faces a legal notice ahead of their Ahmedabad concert: ‚ÄòCannot use children in any form on the s - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Coldplay faces a legal notice ahead of their Ahmedabad concert: ‚ÄòCannot use children in any form on the stage‚Äô

Publication Date: [insert date] | Source: Times of India

Coldplay has been issued a legal notice ahead of their concert in Ahmedabad, stipulating that the band cannot use children in any capacity on stage during their performance. This directive arises amid concerns regarding the safety and ethical implications of child participation in the event.

  • The notice emphasizes the absolute prohibition of children on stage.
  • Concerns about the responsibilities of event organizers regarding child welfare.
  • Coldplay is known for its high-energy performances, raising questions about the potential risks for young participants.
‚ÄúThe safety and well-being of children must be the foremost priority during live performances,‚Äù said [insert relevant authority].

This legal action exemplifies the ongoing discussions surrounding child safety in entertainment venues and may influence future concert policies.

item.title: Coldplay gets notice against using children ahead of Ahmedabad concert - Business Standard
item.description:
Coldplay gets notice against using children ahead of Ahmedabad concert

Publication Date: January 25, 2025
Source: Business Standard

The District Child Protection Unit in Ahmedabad has issued a notice to Chris Martin and the Coldplay concert organizers, prohibiting the use of children on stage and requiring hearing protection for any minors attending the event.

  • The concert is scheduled for January 25 and 26, 2025, at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad.
  • Sound levels exceeding 120 decibels could pose health risks to children.
  • Failure to comply with the directives could result in strict action by authorities.
  • The notice responds to a complaint from Pandit Rao Dharnevar, who raises concerns about children's welfare at concerts.
‚ÄúInvolving children in concerts featuring loud sounds and bright lights can harm their physical health and mental development.‚Äù - Pandit Rao Dharnevar

This notice echoes concerns raised previously by Dharnevar regarding other concerts, emphasizing the need to protect children's rights in entertainment settings.

item.title: Remember the cute child of Heyy Baby? Here's how she looks now after 18 years - India.com
item.description:

If you don‚Äôt remember Angel from the 2007 Bollywood movie Heyy Baby, she is still remembered for her sweet depiction in the film. Juanna Sanghvi, who played Angel, is now 20 years old and recently had throwback pictures go viral online.

item.title: Daaku Maharaaj Trailer: Action and emotion in perfect harmony - 123telugu
item.description:
Daaku Maharaaj Trailer: Action and Emotion in Perfect Harmony

Published on: Jan 5, 2025 8:54 am IST

Daaku Maharaaj, directed by Bobby Kolli and starring Nandamuri Balakrishna, is gearing up for a grand Sankranthi release. This action-packed emotional drama has already captured attention with its high-octane trailer, unveiled during a pre-release event held in Dallas, USA.

  • The trailer builds suspense by keeping the storyline shrouded in mystery.
  • Balakrishna delivers a restrained yet commanding performance with minimal but impactful dialogues.
  • The film's emotional depth, particularly the child sentiment, is a standout element.
  • Thaman‚Äôs background score enhances the trailer‚Äôs impact amidst stunning visuals.
  • The film stars Shraddha Srinath and Pragya Jaiswal in substantial roles, alongside Balakrishna.
  • Bobby Deol plays a ruthless animal smuggler, adding an edge to the narrative.
  • Daaku Maharaaj is set to release on January 12, 2025.

With its intriguing trailer and star-studded cast, the film has already raised expectations to new heights. Stay tuned for more updates on this exciting project.

item.title: "Don't Use...": Coldplay Issued Notice Ahead Of Ahmedabad Concert - NDTV
item.description:
Don't Use...: Coldplay Issued Notice Ahead Of Ahmedabad Concert

Publication Date: Not specified Source: NDTV

The District Child Protection Unit in Ahmedabad has issued a notice to Coldplay, instructing them not to involve children in their concert on January 25-26 at the Narendra Modi Stadium due to health concerns regarding high sound levels.

  • The concert is set to take place at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad.
  • The notice prohibits children from being on stage and mandates ear protection for those attending.
  • Sound levels over 120 decibels are deemed hazardous to children's health.
  • A complaint by Pandit Rao Dharnevar initiated the notice, focusing on protecting children from harmful environments.
  • Dharnevar has previously raised concerns regarding other concerts, advocating for children's rights.
‚ÄúInvolving children in concerts featuring loud sounds can harm their physical health and mental development.‚Äù - Pandit Rao Dharnevar

This notice reflects increasing awareness and action towards safeguarding children's rights in entertainment contexts.

item.title: Arjun Kapoor makes a rare mention of late stepmother Sridevi, calls her ‚Äòma‚Äôam‚Äô - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Arjun Kapoor Reflects on Late Stepmother Sridevi in Rare Mention

Date: Jan 05, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

In a recent interview, Bollywood actor Arjun Kapoor made a rare mention of his late stepmother, legendary actress Sridevi, discussing her in the context of a film set where they both shared a significant connection.

  • Arjun referenced Sridevi while discussing the film 'Roop Ki Rani Choron Ka Raja'.
  • The film was produced by his father Boney Kapoor and featured Sridevi alongside Anil Kapoor.
  • Sridevi was dating Boney Kapoor during the film's production while he was still married to Arjun's mother, Mona Kapoor.
  • Arjun expressed a protective feeling towards his stepsisters after Sridevi's tragic passing in 2018.
  • His upcoming film 'Mere Husband Ki Biwi' is set for release on February 21.
‚ÄúMy entire life with my father was being on Roop Ki Rani Choron Ka Raja set... Even by today‚Äôs standards, it is one of the biggest films we ever made.‚Äù - Arjun Kapoor

This mention highlights Arjun's deep connection to his family and the impact of Sridevi's presence in his life, despite her early passing.

item.title: Who was Jeff Baena? Aubrey Plaza's husband found dead at LA home - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Jeff Baena, Filmmaker and Husband of Aubrey Plaza, Found Dead at 47

Date: Jan 05, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Filmmaker Jeff Baena, known for his works including Life After Beth and Joshy, was found dead in a Los Angeles residence at the age of 47. The cause of death is currently under investigation.

  • Baena directed notable films such as Life After Beth, Joshy, and The Little Hours.
  • He was married to actress Aubrey Plaza, who starred in many of his films.
  • Baena expressed his passion for cinema was influenced by films like A Clockwork Orange and 8 1/2.
  • His family includes his wife Aubrey, mother Barbara, father Scott, and stepfamily.
‚ÄúThe opportunities to create together, to do something creative where we‚Äôre both fulfilled, it‚Äôs like how rare is that?‚Äù - Jeff Baena

Baena's death has raised questions about mental health and the pressures faced by those in the entertainment industry. His contributions to cinema will be remembered.

item.title: Nara Brahmani Rejected Mani Ratnam‚Äôs Movie Offer - M9

Nara Brahmani Rejected Mani Ratnam‚Äôs Movie Offer

Nara Brahmani, daughter of Nandamuri Balakrishna, recently made headlines after it was revealed that she humorously rejected a movie offer from renowned director Mani Ratnam.

  • Nara Brahmani and her sister Tejeswini prefer to stay out of the limelight.
  • Balakrishna disclosed the rejection during his show, highlighting Brahmani's charm.
  • Brahmani expressed her disinterest in acting by saying, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not a heroine face.‚Äù
  • Brahmani is characterized as straightforward, contrasting with her more diplomatic younger sister.
‚ÄúI‚Äôm not a heroine face.‚Äù - Nara Brahmani

This revelation adds to the intrigue surrounding Nara Brahmani, who remains a distinctive figure in the public eye despite her low profile.

item.title: Ram Charan expresses heartfelt thanks to Pawan Kalyan ‚Äì Here‚Äôs why - 123telugu
item.description:
Ram Charan expresses heartfelt thanks to Pawan Kalyan ‚Äì Here‚Äôs why

Published on Jan 5, 2025 | Source: Latest Telugu cinema news

Global Star Ram Charan publicly expressed his gratitude towards Pawan Kalyan during a pre-release event for the film 'Game Changer'.

  • The film is directed by Shankar Shanmugam and is set to release on January 10, 2025.
  • Pawan Kalyan attended the event as the chief guest, whose presence was highlighted by Ram Charan's heartfelt message on social media.
  • Ram Charan thanked Pawan Kalyan for his support and shared a touching message and photos.
  • The film boasts a strong cast including Anjali, Srikanth, and Brahmanandam, and features music by Thaman.
‚ÄúDear Deputy Chief Minister Pawan Kalyan Garu, as your nephew, as an actor, and as a proud Indian, I immensely respect you. Thank you for always being there for me and supporting me. Love always. Blessed and grateful beyond words.‚Äù

Fans commended the bond between Ram Charan and Pawan Kalyan, expressing admiration for the emotional connection.

This heartfelt tribute highlights the strong familial ties and respect in the Telugu film industry.

item.title: When Aubrey Plaza said isolating with husband Jeff Baena in pandemic ‚Äòcould have gone either way‚Äô - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aubrey Plaza Reflects on Time Spent with Late Husband Jeff Baena During Pandemic

Date: Jan 05, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Aubrey Plaza and her husband Jeff Baena spent the pandemic together, reflecting on their relationship and creative endeavors.

  • Jeff Baena, filmmaker known for his work with Aubrey Plaza, was found dead at 47 in Los Angeles.
  • Aubrey shared insights into isolating with Jeff during the pandemic, noting their collaborative work.
  • She described the experience as both enjoyable yet challenging, stating it 'could have gone either way.'
  • The couple worked on multiple projects together, including Plaza's directorial debut.
‚ÄúCould have gone either way, I guess,‚Äù Aubrey Plaza on isolating with Jeff Baena during the pandemic.

This personal reflection highlights the depth of their relationship, even amidst hardship and loss.

item.title: "When The Phone Rings" Ends On Highest Ratings Of Its Run As "When The Stars Gossip" Premieres - soompi
item.description:
When The Phone Rings Ends On Highest Ratings Of Its Run As When The Stars Gossip Premieres

Source: Soompi

MBC‚Äôs ‚ÄúWhen the Phone Rings‚Äù concluded its series with significant ratings, achieving a personal record for viewership. Meanwhile, new dramas are also making headlines with their premieres and competition in the ratings.

  • The finale of ‚ÄúWhen the Phone Rings‚Äù scored an average nationwide rating of 8.6 percent.
  • JTBC's ‚ÄúThe Tale of Lady Ok‚Äù reached a new high with 10.3 percent ratings.
  • tvN‚Äôs ‚ÄúWhen the Stars Gossip‚Äù premiered with a 3.3 percent rating, winning its time slot.

  • KBS 2TV‚Äôs ‚ÄúIron Family‚Äù continues to lead with 17.4 percent ratings.
‚ÄúWhen the Phone Rings‚Äù wrapped up on a new personal record!

In summary, the competitive landscape of Korean dramas continues to shift with significant viewership overlaps and new series captures audience attention.

item.title: Weekly horoscope from January 5 to January 11: Your luck for this week; see which signs have lady luck smiling for them - India Today
item.description:
Weekly Horoscope from January 5 to January 11

Date: January 5, 2025 | Source: Ayush Bisht

Discover your luck for the week as we explore the astrological insights for each zodiac sign from Aries to Pisces.

  • Aries: Focus on resilience despite challenges; patience is advised in financial matters.
  • Taurus: Embrace new ideas and strategies, but be cautious of irritability.
  • Gemini: Balance your financial focus and nurture family ties.
  • Cancer: Work on control of tasks and relationships; be cautious with spending.
  • Leo: Overcome fears to make important decisions; embrace new experiences.
  • Virgo: Let go of grudges and seek enriching experiences; health improves.
  • Libra: Embrace change and work on emotional connections; control expenses.
  • Scorpio: Make decisive choices; manage financial security wisely.
  • Sagittarius: Celebrate achievements and consider volunteer work; health improves.
  • Capricorn: Practice compassion with difficult people; avoid major financial decisions.
  • Aquarius: Re-evaluate your plans and maintain balance in relationships; financial surprises may arise.
  • Pisces: Celebrate hard-earned successes and manage spending thoughtfully.

Published By: Ayush Bisht

Published On: January 5, 2025

item.description:
